ValidationRule.description: The Task Type field must be populated in order to check the AC Change Received field for Handbook support records.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (AC_Change_Received__c), ( ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, '') ), ( RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support HRE/CHB Ref Object" ), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before AC Change Received can be checked, you need to enter a value for Task Type.
